title: When your enemy in low elo tries to freeze and manage minion wave

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Galaxyburstz,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=4joAP8Vm,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-03-11T17:22:44.640+0000)
>
> {{champion:157}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3087}}   E > Q > AA
> 
> _**" nice freeze "**_

Such interaction, much wow, many fun

> [{quoted}](name=Kamille W,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=4joAP8Vm,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-03-11T19:24:40.152+0000)
>
> Hi, I am a low elo peasant I was wondering if any of you could help me learn how to freeze and wave mange please.

I have never heard of this ''wave mange''. Is it a new tactic?
I think of surfer singed trying to learn how to surf and hes foing bot with nami cuz she can make waves

> [{quoted}](name=General Matty,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=4joAP8Vm,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-03-11T19:28:23.949+0000)
>
> I have never heard of this ''wave mange''. Is it a new tactic?

"Our minions' HAIRS ARE FALLING OUT!"

- Jim Carrey, Dumb and Dumber.
Since nobody gonna answer here seriously, there are tutorials on youtube if you want to understand it fast. In text form it's kinda harder to explain.

> [{quoted}](name=ZaFishbone,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=4joAP8Vm,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-03-12T08:37:55.870+0000)
>
> Yeah they do.

Then they have no honour, and not welcome in wakanda. _and hopefully suffered in the snap._
People in my low elo games quite frequently pick it into malz, then they cry.
You are mistaking this with cleanse.
Oh yeah, I honestly forgot this was still in the game.
I see it in ARAM sometimes.

How do i block the creeps from advancing?! Cause they just ignore me and move past me like I'm nothing (even if i play {{champion:54}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:14}} ) - if i try to block their path by stopping in front of them. üòê
This was actually pretty funny, nice one

I legit had a Jax in my game that fed his ass off to riven so he decided to walk into other people lanes. he said " the riven is freezing the lane" 5 seconds after he said that riven was taking the turret
